item.title: World Bank raises China growth forecast to 4.8% despite U.S. trade tensions
item.description: The World Bank now projects 4.8% growth for China, up from 4.0% predicted earlier this year.

item.title: 'Outside of AI, I'm not really excited about anything,' Wells Fargo Chief Equity Strategist Ohsung Kwon says
item.description: Wells Fargo Securities Ohsung Kwon explains why he doesn't expect AI stocks are in a bubble.

item.title: Mike Novogratz's Galaxy Digital jumps after launching retail trading app to rival Robinhood
item.description: Galaxy Digital introduced a commission-free trading platform, Galaxy One, which offers services similar to those of Robinhood.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Critical Metals, Comerica, Advanced Micro Devices, Abercrombie & Fitch and more
item.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest moves midday.

item.title: Paul Tudor Jones says ingredients are in place for massive rally before a 'blow off' top to bull market
item.description: Paul Tudor Jones said today's market is reminiscent of the setup leading up to the burst of the dot-com bubble in late 1999.
